segments.text: I notice the warm light from the window making everything glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so absorbed in drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like a peaceful afternoon routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, water is cascading from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on that stool, stretching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open, he's pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is waiting eagerly, palm up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of cute, their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Though the stool does look unsteady.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't drop those cookies everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, could make things slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden seems so serene in contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of little surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR
